title: Why various objects are used as tools

content.question: Why did Ma Liang use various objects as tools for painting?

choices.label: A rich man hired him to use the objects to make paintings.
His family was too poor to afford even a single paintbrush.
An old man taught him to use the objects as tools for painting.
He believed that using different objects produced more creative art.

content.answer: His family was too poor to afford even a single paintbrush.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
